The writer may not have experience writing for film and may not be able to communicate their ideas effectively to the director and cinematographer (videographer).
3. If the writer doesn’t have enough experience or creativity, the final project won’t be good.
This could make things go badly as the story might not be entertaining or interesting to audiences.
If the story is bad, then people won’t be interested in reading it.
People will think the writer isn’t good enough and won’t want to work with them again.
